meanings.definition: The state of something with regard to its appearance, quality, or working order.
meanings.sent1: The old car was in poor conditions, with rust and dents all over.
meanings.sent2: The factory had to meet safety conditions to continue operating.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the messy room was perfect conditions for a game of hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: The garden flourished in the ideal conditions of sunlight and water.
meanings.sent5: The storm created harsh conditions for the hikers, with strong winds and heavy rain.

meanings.definition: The circumstances affecting the way in which people live or work, especially with regard to their well-being.
meanings.sent1: The poor living conditions in the village led to health problems for many residents.
meanings.sent2: The working conditions in the mine were dangerous and unhealthy.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about the extreme conditions of trying to cook a meal during a power outage.
meanings.sent4: The artist thrived in the challenging conditions of a noisy studio.
meanings.sent5: The new job offered excellent conditions, including flexible hours and great benefits.
